thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: John Fowles

author: John Fowles
title: John Fowles
text: Rentalcars always give us a good service as you can also speak to an agent. If you use First Car Hire - you can use others but these are usually the cheapest for the same class- watch the scam on fill up of petrol at the completion. Always fill up near the airport and keep all the receipts from the whole time, take a photo, and get the form signed with the check in team. You will need all these if you want to get your money back!
